pr_title: feat: Add description annotations to generated CRD yaml

timeline.message:
feat: Add description annotations to generated CRD yaml

A minor update to CrdGenerator allows the description annotations
already in the Java source code to be included in the CRD yaml
files.

Signed-off-by: Dale Lane <dale.lane@uk.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Can you factor out and reuse the logic of io.strimzi.crdgenerator.DocGenerator#getDescription, which adds a full stop if one it missing? It's easier to do this than having to nit pick every time someone forgets to punctuate properly in @Description.
